link: https://chinadigitaltimes.net/chinese/2015/04/翻墙-记录gfw封锁内容及封锁手段的网站/
title: 翻墙 | 记录GFW封锁内容及封锁手段的网站
content:
@fqrouter：这个网站详细记录了什么网站被GFW封的，关键是还记录了是用什么技术手段封的：http://hikinggfw.org/

The aim of Hikinggfw.org?


1. Measurement: Hikinggfw.org monitors what have been blocked, and what technical means the GFW employs to block. Specifically, we monitor:
  • Domain names injected or poisoned;
  • IP addresses blocked by gateway routers
  • Tunnels disabled or interfered by GFW, such as Tor, SSH or OpenVPN

2.Circumvention: According to the measurement result, Hikinggfw.org provides circumvention solutions in response to the level and type of blocking occurring.


翻墙技术博客订阅地址及社交帐号
